name: v2_registries
schema: CREATE TABLE `v2_registries` (`description` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `display_name` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `logo` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `name` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `slug` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `website` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL)
